lead_paragraph: Angus’ Cafe Bistro, a restaurant on West 44th Street, attracted stars and producers of ‘The Producers’ as investors and patrons.
snippet: Angus’ Cafe Bistro, a restaurant on West 44th Street, attracted stars and producers of ‘The Producers’ as investors and patrons.

headline.main: A Homey Hangout for Broadway Stars Closes After 14 Years
headline.print_headline: A Homey Broadway Haunt Ends Its 14-Year Run

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Angus's Cafe and Bistro (Manhattan, NY, Restaurant)

abstract: Regular patrons of Angus's Cafe and Bistro on West 44th Street gather to celebrate restaurant on its last night; restaurant has served theater producers and performers for 14 years, and is being shut down due to failure of owner Angus McIndoe to reach agreement with landlord that would keep restaurant open.
